betterquesting:10.desc:8:
It's in the name. the §6Portable Fluid Tank§r is a convinient way to §acarry lots of §9fluids§a somewhere§r. The Basic Tier has the §ecapacity of 20 buckets§r. 
I personally find it especially useful when I want to carry 500 buckets of chocolate milk on-the-go!

To craft, you'll simply need a §6Redstone Servo§r, §6Copper Ingot§r, and 3 §6Glass§r.

(§7TIP: You can instantly break it by dismantling it with a §6Crescent Hammer§r)
